game.name: Pinball Hero
game.shortDescription: Pinball meets RPG in this fast-paced roguelike. Launch heroic pinballs, battle bumper enemies, and choose your fate through mystery doors. Wield hundreds of powerful items and defeat bosses to reclaim your soul in this retro-inspired reimagining of pinball, where every bounce is a battle.
